review: Love this doohickey. It does what it says and it's as "plug and play" as any device gets. I'd recommend adding one of those 6-8" USB power cables to your order (yes, the Chromecast needs an outboard power source) to avoid the need for a wall outlet and to cut back on cable clutter. Just be sure you'll have an unused USB port on the back of your monitor first.Beam the entertainment you're watching on your Chrome-based computer, tablet or phone to your TV for less than the price of one drink at a good restaurant.What's not a good thing about that?
author: Jim Bosha
